issues.description: The Farm class in the template defines a private no-argument constructor, but students need to create Farm instances (e.g., `new Farm()`) as shown in the Main test code and described in the problem statement. The private constructor blocks instantiation and conflicts with the required public constructor.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the Farm constructor from private to public (i.e., `public Farm() { ... }`) to allow instantiation.

issues.description: The template’s `singFarmSongVerse` method signature omits the required `Animal` parameter, whereas the problem specification and solution expect `singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)`. Without this parameter, students cannot reference the specific animal in each verse.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the stub to `private void singFarmSongVerse(Animal animal)` so it matches the specification and allows using the passed-in animal.
